items.sentence: Tom wished he could spend more time with Mary.
Tom used to always complain about the weather.
Tom leaned down and kissed his son good night.
Tom left the water running and Mary got angry.
What\'s the best advice you\'ve ever received?
What countries are most of your students from?
What do nurses spend most of their time doing?
I wonder why Tom told me we needed to do that.
I wondered whether Tom wanted to dance or not.
Have you ever thought about commiting suicide?
